name: Wind-Up Racer (Edmar)
description:
Race with your wind-up car and collect gears to keep moving. Finish 3 laps and you win!

Controls:

  • Steering: A/D, Left/Right
  • Brake: Shift, S, Down
  • Jump: Spacebar

Gamepad is also supported.

I made the source code for the game available on github: https://github.com/EdmarDev/Wind-Up-Racer.
